mapper.select: SELECT T.TABLE_NO , T.TABLE_NAME FROM TTABLE T WHERE T.STORE_NO = #{storeNo} ORDER BY T.TABLE_NO ASC
SELECT DISTINCT(T.TABLE_NO) , T.TABLE_NAME FROM TTABLE T , TORDER O WHERE T.TABLE_NO = O.TABLE_NO AND T.STORE_NO = #{storeNo} AND O.ORDER_STATUS_NO = 'OS001' ORDER BY T.TABLE_NO ASC

SELECT T.TABLE_NO , T.TABLE_NAME FROM TTABLE T WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM TORDER O WHERE T.TABLE_NO = O.TABLE_NO AND O.ORDER_STATUS_NO = 'OS001' ) AND T.STORE_NO = #{storeNo} ORDER BY T.TABLE_NO ASC
